Text: Shoeboxes are no longer in vogue

Not even tins with bright paint. 
 Memories are uploaded 
 - On drives, phones, desktops

These things that need preserving 
 Do they know they are to be rescued? 
 What museum would keep these? 
 Traces of youth, proofs of living

Not entries in a database 
 Nor artefacts for an archive 
 On what cloud will we register 
 Traces of migrants and refugees?

Not data, not evidence 
 … but memories! 
 Of children’s laughter  
 And stories under seas of stars.
 The future was written on the pages I saved on some of my books.

The words:What do we do with all of this ? 
 Well, we could burn them to ashes

Or make them into a book 
 Or send them to a museum  
 Or make a movie about them 
 Or put them on the internet 
 What about a movie about this book?
DO: Songs change the world. Sing one or listen to one!
